measuretools.scale¶

abjad.tools.measuretools.scale(expr, multiplier=Rational(1, 1))¶

Iterate expr. For every measure in expr:

  1. multiply measure’s meter by multiplier
  2. scale measure’s contents to fit new meter

Extends containertools.contents_scale( ). Returns None because iterates possibly many measures.

This might best be a bound method on RigidMeasure.

Previous topic

measuretools.report_meter_distribution

Next topic

measuretools.scale_and_remeter
